name: Tuitbot
description: Bridges Tuitbot MCP tools into OpenClaw for AI agent integration

tuitbotBinaryPath.description: Path to the tuitbot binary. Defaults to 'tuitbot' (resolved via PATH).

configPath.description: Path to the tuitbot config.toml file. Defaults to ~/.tuitbot/config.toml.

allowedTools.description: Allowlist of MCP tool names to register. Empty or omitted = register all tools.
